directions: In a large pot, bring the water to a boil. Add lima beans, salt and sugar. Cook over medium-low heat for 15 minutes. Add the corn and green chilies, cover, and continue cooking until the beans are tender, about 5 more minutes. Drain and serve immediately. Top with butter if desired.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) package frozen Fordhook lima beans, thawed
1 (16 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
1 (4 ounce) can chopped green chile peppers
title: Al's Sufferin' Succotash
